description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `username` in method `Spryker\Zed\Acl\Dependency\Facade\AclToUserBridge::getUserByUsername()`.
Bridges: Method `getUserByUsername()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `getCurrentUser()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `isSystemUser()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
